title: Workshop on Online Higher Education Teaching Method Design Utilizing Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: University lecture experience (no online lecture experience)
context.additional_context: Social sector job competency enhancement program for current industry practitioners

learning_goals: Design at least three types of interactive learning activities using digital tools.
Apply strategies to implement social·cognitive·facilitative presence in online learning environments.
Operate a real-time feedback system for formative assessment in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
